dialogue: It feels as if the distance has increased.
Is it far from here.... your village?
Do you see that hill? It is behind it.
It may look close... but the road is long.
There is a story about these mangroves. They would say that a spirit from the water would come and roam in the forest at night, devouring souls of the weak hearted.
As kids we used to play a game. Just to get thrills. I was really quite good at it... I would always win.
Once I stayed out so late, they all thought I got eaten by the spirit! No one had lasted more than ten minutes before!
No. I thought it was my bad luck... but maybe it is only when you are afraid of something that you see it. If you are not afraid, it seizes to exist!
I think as we grow old we become more fearful... I have forgotten what it feels like to be young.
No come on Prabha! You stay till the evening...
We can get some crabs for dinner too... then you can take the night bus back.
It is the least I can do! You came all the way
I don't mind. It was a holiday for us! As if Dr. Supriya ever gives leave
